scenes.background: You highlighted the issue of relying on people during their time off. Later, [Monica] and [Bob] continue the conversation in the office group chat.
scenes.description: 'I understand your point about planning, but without your help, we might miss the deadline. What do you suggest we do now?'

options.text: It's tough, but maybe splitting the task among multiple people could help.
options.analysis: You suggested a practical solution, showing good social skills and emotional balance, but empathy and self-regulation could be improved.

options.text: Alright, I'll help out this time, but we need to ensure better planning in the future.
options.analysis: You agreed to help, showing good emotional control and motivation. However, empathy and emotional perception could be better.

options.text: I don't think it's fair to expect people to work during their time off. We need to address this systematically.
options.analysis: You pointed out the fairness issue, showing good emotional control and motivation. However, empathy and emotional perception were lacking.
